name: sleepytime
0:
”Alexa tell sleepy time I have to wake up at 6 AM.”
”Alexa ask sleepy time when to get up if I go to bed now.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleepy time
des:
Wake up and fall asleep according to a circadian sleep schedule. Tell Alexa what time you want to wake up, and get a list of ideal times you should fall asleep to awake and feel well rested.
You can also ask what the ideal time to wake up would be if you fall asleep right now.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
